page.title: 09THE CHURCH IN CHEVINGTON
page.content: ALL SAINTS, in the village of Chevington is well supported with large congregations with a high percentage of young people attending. The Rector Rev.C.Kevill-Davies is shared with the parishes of Hargave, Whepstead and Brockley. Every 2nd Sunday at 10.30am while Parish Communion is held in the Church children have a Sunday School in the School taken by the Deacon. They talk about Bible stories and make cards for baptisms and church weddings. After Communion the children join in a Family Service in the Church. Then coffee & biscuits is served for all in the School. This is a very popular service. School age children also attend Monday Club taken by the Rector in the School 5.30-6.30pm. They read and talk Bible stories, draw pictures and make moulds, also raise money by making sweets etc. to sponsor a 9 year old girl in India.
